CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Ownership_Status__c) ,"Prospecting", ProspectingStart__c ,"Lockout", LockoutStart__c ,"Workable", WorkableStart__c ,"Wash", NFI_WashStart__c ,"Not Interested", NFI_WashStart__c ,"Commission Only", CommissionStart__c ,null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The start date of the current status
CustomField.label: Status Start Date
